page.title: 02Housing
page.content: The main housing areas in Kingsdown are,Lower Kingsdown:mainly cottages , Upper Kingsdown:cottages, Balmoral Estate:modern bungalows and the Victoria Estate: expensive housing. There are about 128 houses under 20 years old and 36 houses that are brand new the rest of the housing is over 20 years old.The main kind of housing in Kingsdown is detached bungalows but there are also other kinds of housing including semi_detached,terraced and a few flats. Important Houses Kingsdown house is a place of historic interest,where William Curling Esquire who built many of the houses in the village including the church,rectory and hall lived. Dial cottage was originally a farm. Robin Hill:secret smuggling passages.
